testcase.classname: US1015 Webuniversity sayfasinda yanlis bilgilerle giris yapilamamali
testcase.name: TC23 yanlis bilgilerle giris yapilamadigini test eder
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "webUniUrl" anasayfaya gider................................passed Then Login Portal a kadar asagi iner........................................passed And Login Portal a tiklar...................................................passed Then acilan ikinci window'a gecer...........................................passed And username ve password kutularina fake degerler yazdirir..................passed And login butonuna basar....................................................passed Then Popup ta cikan yazinin "validation failed" oldugunu test eder..........passed And Ok diyerek Popup'i kapatir..............................................passed When Ilk sayfaya geri doner.................................................passed Then Ilk sayfaya donuldugunu test eder......................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC24 kullanici kayit olusturabilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "automationUrl" anasayfaya gider............................passed And user sign up linkine tiklar.............................................undefined And user Create and account bölümüne email adresi girer.....................skipped And signUp butonuna basar...................................................skipped And user kisiel bilgilerini ve iletisim bilgilerini girer...................skipped And user Create Account butonuna basar......................................skipped Then hesap olustugunu test edin.............................................skipped And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................skipped
